casebody.data:
J. H. BRACKIN v. THE UNITED STATES [Congressional No. 17766]

[Ante, p. 457; 317 U. S. —]

Bankhead Cotton Act of 1934; liability of Government in connection with tax exemption certificate pool.

Decided April 6, 1942; plaintiff’s petition dismissed. Plaintiff’s motion for new trial overruled June 1, 1942.

Plaintiff’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court October 19, 1942.
